submitRequirements_zh: 需要提供AI工具的详细信息，包括功能介绍、使用场景等
submitRequirements_en: Detailed information about AI tools required, including feature descriptions, use cases, etc.
rating_zh: 专业的AI工具导航网站，收录了大量优质的AI工具和资源。分类清晰，更新及时，是发现和了解AI工具的好平台。
rating_en: Professional AI tools directory website that includes a large number of high-quality AI tools and resources. Clear categorization, timely updates, a great platform for discovering and learning about AI tools.
